x_title: label in plot, y_id used if unspecified
x_id: x column header name or name of parameter to be extracted from file name
y_title: label in plot, y_id used if unspecified
y_id: list of column headers, single column header or column letter

schema.file_extension: only set if you want to limit the data files to a certain type ie csv or xlsx
schema.index_col: int of index column, NULL or don't include if not used

error_y.value: change to floating point or integer

pio.template: plotly_white, see readme for more examples
marker_symbols: list of marker symbols numbers, must have one for each trace
parent_plot_info: (unimplemented), name of parent plot before plot_info.json
